Sure! Here are revised bullet points for each food item:

1. Breaded Chicken Goujons:
* Chicken strips coated in breadcrumbs and spices
* Provides a convenient and easy protein option for meals or snacks
* Perfect for dipping in various sauces or dressings
* Provides a consistent and high-quality chicken product
1. Cooked Chicken Breast Sliced 5mm:
* Chicken breast slices that are cooked and sliced for convenience
* Provides a versatile and easy protein option for meals or snacks
* Can be used in a variety of dishes, like salads, sandwiches, and wraps
* Provides a consistent and high-quality chicken product
1. Southern Fried Chicken Goujons:
* Chicken strips coated in a Southern-style seasoning and breadcrumbs
* Provides a convenient and easy protein option for meals or snacks
* Perfect for dipping in various sauces or dressings
* Provides a consistent and high-quality chicken product
1. Baking Parchment 450mm x 50m:
* Provides a non-stick and easy-to-clean surface for baking
* Can be used in a variety of baking applications, like cookies or cakes
* Helps to prevent food from sticking and promotes even cooking
* Provides a durable and affordable option for baking needs
1. Buffet Sausage Rolls 1.5" Unbaked:
* Miniature sausage rolls that are unbaked for convenience
* Perfect for a party or event as a finger food
* Provides a delicious and easy appetizer option
* Can be customized with various seasonings or dipping sauces

Don't tell me they are "unbaked for convenience", word it in a more concise way.

Sure, here are the revised bullet points for each food item:

1. Shredded Mozzarella/Cheddar Mix 70%/30%:
* Blend of shredded mozzarella and cheddar cheese
* Perfect for adding flavor and texture to a variety of dishes
* Ideal for pizzas, pastas, and casseroles
* Provides a convenient and pre-shredded cheese option
1. Shredded Mozzarella Cheese:
* Shredded mozzarella cheese
* Perfect for adding flavor and texture to a variety of dishes
* Ideal for pizzas, pastas, and salads
* Provides a convenient and pre-shredded cheese option
1. Macaroni:
* Small, tube-shaped pasta
* Perfect for making classic macaroni and cheese dishes
* Can be used in a variety of pasta salads and casseroles
* Provides a versatile and easy-to-cook pasta option
1. Farfalle:
* Bow-tie shaped pasta
* Provides a unique and fun shape for pasta dishes
* Can be used in a variety of pasta salads and casseroles
* Provides a versatile and easy-to-cook pasta option
1. Conchiglie:
* Shell-shaped pasta
* Provides a unique and fun shape for pasta dishes
* Can be used in a variety of pasta salads and casseroles
* Provides a versatile and easy-to-cook pasta option
1. Fusilli:
* Spiral-shaped pasta
* Provides a unique and fun shape for pasta dishes
* Can be used in a variety of pasta salads and casseroles
* Provides a versatile and easy-to-cook pasta option
1. Tricolour Fusilli:
* Spiral-shaped pasta in three colors (green, white, and orange)
* Provides a unique and colorful addition to pasta dishes
* Can be used in a variety of pasta salads and casseroles
* Provides a versatile and easy-to-cook pasta option
1. Penne:
* Short, tube-shaped pasta
* Perfect for a variety of pasta dishes, including baked ziti and pasta salads
* Provides a versatile and easy-to-cook pasta option
* Can be used with a variety of sauces and seasonings

Sure, here are the revised bullet points for each food item:

1. Spaghetti:
* Long, thin, cylindrical pasta
* Perfect for a variety of pasta dishes, including spaghetti bolognese and carbonara
* Provides a versatile and easy-to-cook pasta option
* Can be used with a variety of sauces and seasonings
1. Individual Syrup Sponge Puddings:
* Single-serving sponge puddings with a syrup topping
* Perfect for a quick and easy dessert option
* Can be served with ice cream or custard
* Provides a delicious and comforting dessert option
1. Individual Sticky Toffee Flavour Sponge Puddings (1 x 12):
* Pack of 12 single-serving sponge puddings with a sticky toffee topping
* Perfect for a quick and easy dessert option
* Can be served with ice cream or custard
* Provides a delicious and comforting dessert option
1. Individual Spotted Dick Sponge Puddings:

* Can be served with ice cream or custard
* Provides a delicious and comforting dessert option

* Can be served with ice cream or custard
* Provides a delicious and comforting dessert option
1. Individual Chocolate Sponge Puddings:

1. Lemon Shortbread Cheesecake:
